answers.answer: I'm currently 35 weeks 3 days. Due May 28th with my second. At my appt the other day at 35 weeks 1 day I was measuring 36 which they said was fine. I've felt a ton of pressure and the "falling" out feeling for a long time. My doctor said that it's typical after multiple pregnancies. Not to mention I'm 7 years older this time around.

When I was 33.4 weeks I was measuring 39 weeks. Now I'm 35 weeks getting measured again Monday. All tests point to healthy mom and baby she's just pretty big and I have extra fluid. I'm hoping she's ready to make her appearance sooner than later!

Yeah they are doing an ultra sound because I have been measuring big awhile. All my blood work and diabetes test are perfect.  They just want to make sure everything is alright. I had a chemical pregnancy before this so I dont know if they think maybe it wasnt and I am really 37 weeks.

question: Im 34 weeks and measuring 37 weeks, we find out Tuesday why. Im so uncomfortable and I keep feeling like im going to squash my baby. Last night when I went to get out of bed I gor a sharp pain I thought I hurt the baby. I feel like this baby is just going to fall out of me. Does anyone else feel this way. Wondering if baby willstay until May 29th. I dont think I have ever been this uuncomfortable or in pain with my other babies.
title: so uncomfortable
